page.title: 16A TYPICAL DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: When I got to school I hung up my coat and talked in the playground until we went in at 9.00. Miss Selby came in and asked us about the news and we talked about the recent earthquake in Mexico. Then we watched Music Time and went out to play. I played Stuck in the Mud and It. When we came in I did maths till 11.50 when we packed up so that the tables could be laid for dinner. We played before lunch then said a prayer. We had chips, carrots, peas and beefburger,and Swiss Roll. We went out to play but at 12.30 6 of us girls got our recorders and practised until Mrs.Hunt came and then she helped us. At 1.00 we got on with our English work until 2.15. After 15 mins. play we had to write a script for a play which I did with 6 friends. At 3.30 we said a prayer and went home. KATHRYN ABRAHAM
